definitions.definition: a formal talk on a serious subject given to a group of people, especially students:
examples: We went to a lecture on Italian art.

definitions.definition: an angry or serious talk given to someone in order to criticize their behaviour:
examples: My dad gave me a lecture on the evils of alcohol last night.

definitions.definition: to give a formal talk to a group of people, often at a college or university:
examples: For ten years she lectured in law.

definitions.definition: to talk angrily or seriously to someone in order to criticize their behaviour:
examples: His parents used to lecture him on his table manners.
